name: Cornelius's Mountain Climb
description:
This game is based on a character created by my mother, Rebecca Smith (who made the majority of the art assets for this game) for her not-yet-released children's book.

This is more of a rough sketch of what the full game would look like (sort of a Level 1 if you will) and is made for children, hence it being very easy to beat.

This was the first game I made with Unity.
